website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Commit was able to meet the expectations of those who were looking for an all-around, comfortable training shoe. Its performance was efficient during a wide range of cross-training activities. The reviewers also marveled at its sleek design, right fit, sturdiness, and lightweight nature. On the downside, it apparently caused some discomfort and required a break-in period.
pros: A vast majority of purchasers considered the Under Armour Commit a comfortable and versatile training shoe
Many wearers lauded the glove-like fit of the footwear
The size and fit were right for most buyers
It provided a solid base for weight training, according to the gym-goers
A good number of testers were impressed by its supportive nature for multi-directional movements
A lot of reviewers found the clean, sharp design of the trainer very appealing
A handful of users took note of its ample cushioning for various types of exercises
cons: The trainer seemed a bit heavy for plenty of testers
Numerous users experienced some discomfort with the heel and the tongue
they rubbed against their skin causing blisters
A few reviewers wished for a removable insole in the trainer

customer_reviews.title: As expected...would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black/black shoe. I’m so glad that I bought a half size bigger (wear US men’s size 11, bought a size 11.5). The shoes feel and look great! It took about 8 days to arrive which was earlier than stated. I just received them so I don’t yet know how they will feel once I start playing tennis and running in them. Looking to buy in different colors after I break these in.
customer_reviews.author: Katalyst

customer_reviews.title: Short shoes
customer_reviews.text: The width was tight, but that could have been broken in. The shoe is about 1/2 a size too small. This can't be broken in ... The arch was good and the style was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Clarke

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are 1/3 the price of the high end sneakers I have been buying for the last ten years.They are very light @ the bottoms are really cushioned great. I read a lot of reviews @ most of them were great. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Oshetski

customer_reviews.title: No more New Balance
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing new balance for years until I bought a pair of Under Armour shoes for him. He IMMEDIATLEY fell in love and has been getting them since. This pair was the only pair that was slightly snug, but they are still like walking on clouds. My husband is on his feet every minute of every day until he hits the bed at night. The difference in his mood "oddly enough" even has had a noticeable change since he feet aren't as sore.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are cheaply made and uncomfortable. Among the worst Ive owned.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work and leisure. Thank goodness they aren't for working out. These shoes are plasticky and very uncomfortable, even when walking. I usually buy Nike and Asics and figured I would give UA a shot, but these are really bad and were still fairly expensive. Wore them too much to return, and regretting my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Snow

customer_reviews.title: Mine ran small.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a comfortable Men’s 14 in Brooks, New Balance, Converse and Nike. I could barely slip my feet into these. Had to return them. Construction looks solid. I might try a size up.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My dad likes these and wanted them as a replacement for his everyday sneakers. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ofira

customer_reviews.title: My new go to CF shoe
customer_reviews.text: All reviews said runs a bit small, so I bought 8.5 instead of 8 and they are AWESOME! Use for Crossfit workouts and some 1/3 level pro Olympic lifting. Coached Crossfit 6 years and always wore nano, which I also love. I have some foot issues that benefit from a bit more padding on the sole, which this shoe provides. This is a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but shipping was not good
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 3rd pair of this particular style under armour shoe. I paid the retail price and thought i was getting a new pair but that wasn't the case. The box was completely tore up, and the shoes had been worn before kinda dissapointed in this but i still kept them. I just hope the next pair i buy is not in the same shape. NOTE though if you are a size 13 go with a 14 though but i already knew that prior to buying these.
customer_reviews.author: jww778

customer_reviews.title: You can view a wide variety shoe styles and colors online in one place.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and style of the shoe and it fits good on my feet with no rubbing on my toes. Be sure to get a 1/2 to 1 size bigger than what size you usually get to be sure that you have good toe room. And the shoes arrived ahead of schedule, that's nice. What I didn't like is they were out of stock on some shoes I was interested in and didn't know when those types of shoe would be available again.
customer_reviews.author: ShdMstr.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and the balls of my feet, the 2nd toe pushes harder down than the big toe. These shoes are a hard bottom sole and keeps all the balls placement in the correct posture.. A great match for my feet for working out. No more other brands, finally found d the perfect shoe that helps. I've put over 50 miles worth of hot desert up hill and down hill walks. 2-4 miles every other day for 2 months. Thanks Under Armour for think about my kind of feet. I can run my 2 miles again without the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jason

customer_reviews.title: Supporting American Supporting Companies
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shoe is very comfortable. Solid ankle support, layered soles that provide comfort and traction, and they look great. My only complaint is that the toe box is very tight and I have standard width feet.. Definitely get a half size larger than you typically would, as they run a bit small! I typically wear 9.5 and got a 10.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: I've had the best experience with Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: I've had the best experience with Under Armour. Their shoes have always fit better than any other brand I've tried in the past. And given the frequency and the intensity in which I train in, Under Armour shoes have been the most accommodating and most durable ones that last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan R

customer_reviews.title: All day support but a bit snug.
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on one foot. I wear a size 14 and buy Under Armour as their size is usually spot on compared to other brands. This pair however is a bit tight but still wearable for walking. They might be too tight for running or other sports. I wear these shoes at work where I am on my feet 6 to 8 hours a day. My feet feel pretty good at the end of the day compared to the N ike brand I was previously wearing.
customer_reviews.author: S K Diva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a small foot, size 7 1/2, and finding a shoe which fits and looks nice is usually difficult. He was very pleased when trying on the shoes and, after wearing them, he kept commenting on how well they fit and look. By the way, he has received compliments from other people saying the shoes could be worn with anything (workout clothing, casual dress wear etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great (smaller) shoe!! Still good for a HIIT
customer_reviews.text: I love Under Armour line up because the quality, so it's as same as this shoe too. I praise for the quality of its material, however, it's not accurately fit regarding the accuracy of its size. I used to wear size 42 (International Size) for my sport shoe and it always fits well with my feet. Unfortunately, it's narrower for this shoe width. I felt it when I walked about 3,000-4,000 steps and felt hurt on my instep. I still wear this shoe for working out because it's great for HIIT exercise and weight training instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Rahman Putra

customer_reviews.title: Good but a tad small
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes for the gym. Very stable and sturdy. I think I would like them a little more if they were a half size larger, but I tend to like a little extra room in the toe. If you like a snug fit, your regular size might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: P.O.

customer_reviews.title: I'm considering getting these just to wear as every day shoes
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I use them as cross-training shoes during kickboxing, which means I'm kicking a heavy bag hundreds and hundreds of times - they look great and are still in fantastic condition. The heel is extremely sturdy and keeps me well balanced. The top of the shoe is highly breathable. They look VERY nice (like expensive sports shoes) and I got compliments from people the first day I wore them. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewertothemax

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, good shoe
customer_reviews.text: They were a little snug at first, but now that I have worn them for a few week, they fit great. I work out with them 4 or 5 times a week and they have held up great. Just enough cushion, and just enough bounce.
customer_reviews.author: 2centsdawg

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Feels great. The soles are glued in. I usually replace soles right out of the box but you can’t with these. Other than that, great purchase! Wouldn’t do high impact work in these though. Save that for running/greater cushioning shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Michelle Colberg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, I wear them at work all the time and they are super comfortable with me being on my feet all day. Highly recommend for ever day wear and workout’s as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, very light!
customer_reviews.text: I know some of the reviews say to order a larger size, but I ordered a 12.5 and it is too large, get true to size and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended brand, probably defective ones
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of use, and almost got a hole on the side of the left shoe. Got disappointed, last pair last me 1 year, and I’m using theme around the house. That pair I bought for my work.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Voytovych

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present & they were to small now they state it is to late to return $80.00 down the drain just need to exchange for a size 12
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: My dad only wore them once and it’s smells like bad rubber . My father is very clean person so it was a shock to have smelled so bad after just one use
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Buy them if you want to hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are okay. My husband has fell in them several times resulting in hurting his knee. He says the are very slick. There's no traction on the sole of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This you lasted one year and was very good quali. The most I have gotten out of a highly used pair of shoes as ever!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hajdasz

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for use in the gym and they more than serve their function. Great grip for staying put while squatting and for foot placement on machines like leg press. Light weight and breathable so feet aren't steaming by workout's end. An all around great gym shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MrMysteryGuest

customer_reviews.title: Orange NOT red. Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: The color of the UA and the back pull up strap is not as seen in the picture. Its more like a nasty bright orange than a red.
customer_reviews.author: brents9d4honda

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a true size 12, tried these on in DSW in 12 and they were too tight he said. They didn’t have a 12.5 so we looked them up on amazon and ordered them here. He loves them. They do fit and he says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie McKechine

customer_reviews.title: Good sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Almost 1 year and these UA shoes have been comfortable and seem to be good quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lmo

customer_reviews.title: I like the look, but
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a little tighter than what I wanted...the look is nice and I enjoy the company.
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is cheaply made, has no cushioning and simply uncomfortable. Tried to break them in, but they are simply too stiff and unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Great for price. Use them as work out shoes and dailys sometimes. Held up great, I power lift and do high cardio intervals like insanity. Definitely great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe and I love the look of it!
customer_reviews.text: Use this shoe for all-around body workout with my trainer and for walking my dog. Sturdy shoe and I love the look of it! I have it in four different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fit Small, recommend ordering half size to one full size larger
customer_reviews.text: I would order one size larger than normal. Description sizing incorrect needs to be updated.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes. Good cushioning. Ordered 1/2 size larger. Still not quite wide enough. Good enough for what I need them for
customer_reviews.author: jeffw79

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of shoes I could wear at work that offered more support than traditional dress shoes. I took a chance on these since the color scheme would work with many of outfits. The fit and support are amazing. Better than expected. My feet are fairly narrow and I was pleasantly surprised how well the width fit. I am so glad I tried Under Armour shoes and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks good and fits well. I receive compliments concerning appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Bea May

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Of all the brands of shoes I've owned in my lifetime, UA brand last me the longest and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HKMR762

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: looked good but had to send back. Runs smaller than normal
customer_reviews.author: Tom W. Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend as a birthday gift and he says they fit perfectly! He was very happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I mostly wear Nikes but decided to try Under Armour and I must admit this shoe is extremely comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: So long Nike.......
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a new brand since Nike went in to politics. I am very happy with the looks, comfort and value of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best shoes I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I put at least 10 miles a day on my feet and these leave me ready for 10 more.
customer_reviews.author: dirtyNWboy

customer_reviews.title: Very odd feeling
customer_reviews.text: The soles are made of very course, still materiel that makes walking odd. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great but were much too narrow for my husbands feet. Lucky for me, returns are so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lusetta

customer_reviews.title: Even better than Nike and Adidas.
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable they are. I mostly use it for weight lifting and a bit of running. Comming from nike and Adidas, these shoes are just as good even a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, the soles are a bit thicker than the picture portrays
customer_reviews.author: taylor h

customer_reviews.title: Have had for 6 mths onl
customer_reviews.text: Used for casual use, not exercise. Heal is progressively more and more uncomfortable around ankle, like it’s Wearing out there and sticking into skin. Expected more from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Noonan

customer_reviews.title: good sneakers for moderate activity
customer_reviews.text: bought these sneakers for the gym.. working out with machines and shooting baskets.. good for that level of activity but wouldnt wear these to play a serious basketball game as they dont have near the kind of support for intense activity
customer_reviews.author: abraham s. feld

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected I wear 8, I ordered 8
customer_reviews.text: Pitch gray and black good looking shoe well made feels great now how long will they last,they came up when I put in UA reflective they are not,arrived very quickly great price two thumbs up Amazon
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking these shoes for my workouts and just walking around.
customer_reviews.author: rodney towe

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but a little too stiff and heavy for me. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy about damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: The shoe box was badley damaged and the shoes looked like they were tried on.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a low price
customer_reviews.text: great. stable, perfect for cross-training & HIIT. Definitely go with the comments and buy a half size larger than you think you'd normally wear. I'm usually a 10.5, ordered size 11 and the fit is perfect. I'd order another pair whenever I wear these out
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I think they are a good price and good buy. Recommend them for anyone wanting a stylish shoe for running, working out, or an evening out
customer_reviews.author: Devan brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but run a tad small
customer_reviews.text: We had to go up a half size in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Usually I’m a men’s size 9 in under armor shoes. I have ordered several other pairs with no issue. This particular shoe was too small. Says size 9 but did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not your regular UA
customer_reviews.text: Half size too small. Upper material is some sort of plastic/ vinyl. Not what I have know from previous UA shoes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking on all surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is comfortable like sneaker, sturdy and rigid enough for rougher terrain, and looks so good you wouldn't know they were for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good entry show for weightlifting
customer_reviews.text: Little to no arch support but this is not for running. Good show for weight lifting and light cross training. Does run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lendo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking/fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. My 9 yo son want them too!
customer_reviews.author: David Kozelsky

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: These became my favorite shoes after the first time i wore them. Extremely comfortable for long days of walking upwards to 10 miles a day. I will buy them again when I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good shoe... quality is great so far
customer_reviews.author: Atef

customer_reviews.title: Just alright...
customer_reviews.text: Figured I’d try Under Armor’s Training sneaker to compare to it’s Nike counterpart (I’ve worn Nike for a while)...the sneaker is alright for walking/daily use...it’s not great for the gym (not using them for running)...I will buy Nike over Under Armor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Scicchitano

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Go a half size larger IMO. I am always a 10.5 but an 11 would have been perfect...I am able to break these in though and like the sneaker..
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R

customer_reviews.title: Great workout/training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. The toe box needs a little more width but it’ll stretch a bit with use. I use them for kettlebell workouts, weights and stretching. Great flat shoe for this purpose. The tread grips well and isn’t overly aggressive. Very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Color is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneaker but hate the color. The picture makes the sneaker look like a very (almost white) gray. However, they are the "cement" gray... Ugh...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but runs a little small. My husband is a 13 and these are too tight he cant wear them.
customer_reviews.author: courtney lee

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes felt a 1/2 size to full size too small and I had to return them. The return was easy since I could just bring it to Kohl’s. Comfort otherwise felt good
customer_reviews.author: Mark Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking, working out, or casual at the office on a Friday! Can’t wait to get another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair that is size 9. Bought a 9 1/2.. Still too small??? Wth
customer_reviews.author: mcloving

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, durable, stable, mid-weight
customer_reviews.text: Great for gym work: cross-training & weight lifting, a bit heavy for long outdoor runs, fine for shorter, pavement heavy runs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing under armour sneakers for years and I love all of under armour products but seems to me like under armour are making their sneaks narrow now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a gift for husband who is a coach, is very active and lives in sneakers. He enjoys this brand because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen McCord

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size, NOT larger
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking shoe, could use a bit more cushioning. You're mostly paying for the look with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Wang

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, comfortable. Maybe you should buy half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik c. ç

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: What I expected in fit and using for relaxed walking
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality shoe that you would expect from Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe with quality comfort and fitness. I wear them when I workout at the gym or cycling on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY BRANIK

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little snug when I got them. But they are breaking in great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: the right size
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are really comfortable and light. They are ideal for working out
customer_reviews.author: Luis F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great Looking shoes, they are nice and feel just right.
customer_reviews.author: Is

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Like the sneakers but a little bit tight around toes
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a good running shoe sorry I tried hard
customer_reviews.text: It worth the money and Definitely not a good running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit really good and are really comfortable but there really narrow shoes
customer_reviews.author: Tweed

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for the price. Nice style very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jose c

customer_reviews.title: Over all I live them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 8 and I almost could had used a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Krantz

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for any sport
customer_reviews.text: Comfortness and more strong. Very good for all sports.. super grip.
customer_reviews.author: gopi sendurpandian

customer_reviews.title: Training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great for training in the gym! Nice dark black and the tan sole sticks out.
customer_reviews.author: Phil E Barker

customer_reviews.title: Color?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good here, was expecting more darker like the photo, but came as more grey. Still cool though
customer_reviews.author: it'sfauxXD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: I work at a gym so they are perfect for that
customer_reviews.author: Carlos  &

customer_reviews.title: Love them x10000
customer_reviews.text: These UA commits are the deal. I've been wearing the UA micro g asserts for a couple years, and these are a definite upgrade in feel and look. The black with the gum accents on the sole looks awesome. *UPDATE* I usually wear an 11 in under armour but had to exchange for an 11.5. No worries with Amazon easy return.
customer_reviews.author: 88FISHING

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic shoes! I use them for HIIT training and I couldn’t be happier. Very supportive and great cushion on arches and heels when jumping. Great support for side to side athletic conditioning as well. A+
customer_reviews.author: Just being honest

product_meta.title: Under Armour Commit TR Training Shoes
product_meta.description: The lightweight mesh upper ensures perfect breathability The external TPU buttress provides more support and increases the stability of the low platform The leather strap in the central part of the foot offers a comfortable support for the arch The cushioned midsole adapts to the shape of the foot so as to avoid possible slippage and offer maximum comfort to the sole of the foot The Charged Cushioning insole ensures extremely responsive cushioning Pattern of the customized tread sole for greater grip and traction on any surface Differential: 10 mm Weight: 323 g
feature_bullets: The external TPU buttress provides more support and increases the stability of the low platform
The leather strap in the central part of the foot offers a comfortable support for the arch
The cushioned midsole adapts to the shape of the foot so as to avoid possible slippage and offer maximum comfort
The Charged Cushioning insole ensures extremely responsive cushioning
Pattern of the customized tread sole for greater grip and traction on any surface
